events.name: Environmental Impact of Li-ion Batteries (LIBs)
events.wd_description: LIBs can reduce carbon emissions by powering EVs and promoting renewable energy, but their production still heavily relies on fossil fuels, raising environmental concerns.
events.description: LIBs can reduce carbon emissions by powering EVs and promoting renewable energy, but their production still heavily relies on fossil fuels, raising environmental concerns.

events.name: Skyrocketing Growth of EV Market
events.wd_description: The EV market has seen tremendous growth in the past 5 years, with a continuing, exponential increase expected, leading to a significant implementation of LIBs in EVs.
events.description: The EV market has seen tremendous growth in the past 5 years, with a continuing, exponential increase expected, leading to a significant implementation of LIBs in EVs.

events.name: Attention from Various Sectors
events.wd_description: LIBs have garnered huge attention from academia, industry, government, non-governmental organizations, investors, and the general public.
events.description: LIBs have garnered huge attention from academia, industry, government, non-governmental organizations, investors, and the general public.

events.name: Implementation in EVs
events.wd_description: Tremendous volumes of LIBs are already implemented in EVs today.
events.description: Tremendous volumes of LIBs are already implemented in EVs today.

events.name: Future Growth
events.wd_description: A continuing, exponential growth of LIB implementation in EVs is expected for the coming years.
events.description: A continuing, exponential growth of LIB implementation in EVs is expected for the coming years.

events.name: Life Cycle Assessment of LIBs
events.wd_description: Life cycle assessment studies evaluate the environmental impact of LIBs and compare EVs with internal combustion engine vehicles regarding environmental sustainability.
events.description: Life cycle assessment studies evaluate the environmental impact of LIBs and compare EVs with internal combustion engine vehicles regarding environmental sustainability.

events.name: Environmental Impact Studies
events.wd_description: Studies that examine the environmental impact of LIBs throughout their life cycle.
events.description: Studies that examine the environmental impact of LIBs throughout their life cycle.

events.name: Comparison with ICE Vehicles
events.wd_description: Comparison of EVs and internal combustion engine vehicles in terms of environmental sustainability.
events.description: Comparison of EVs and internal combustion engine vehicles in terms of environmental sustainability.

events.name: Holistic View of LIB Development
events.wd_description: Insights into materials development, manufacturing, recycling, legislation and policy, and future development of LIBs and charging infrastructure.
events.description: Insights into materials development, manufacturing, recycling, legislation and policy, and future development of LIBs and charging infrastructure.

events.name: Materials Development
events.wd_description: Development of cathode materials to balance sustainability, cost, and performance.
events.description: Development of cathode materials to balance sustainability, cost, and performance.

events.name: Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Reliable LIB manufacturing requires support from a robust supply chain.
events.description: Reliable LIB manufacturing requires support from a robust supply chain.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: Development of economically and environmentally favorable recycling technologies to enhance the sustainability of LIBs.
events.description: Development of economically and environmentally favorable recycling technologies to enhance the sustainability of LIBs.

events.name: Legislation and Policy
events.wd_description: Government policies and legislation significantly impact the supply chain, manufacturing, and recycling of LIBs.
events.description: Government policies and legislation significantly impact the supply chain, manufacturing, and recycling of LIBs.

events.name: Future Development
events.wd_description: Visionary scheme for future LIB development and charging infrastructure construction.
events.description: Visionary scheme for future LIB development and charging infrastructure construction.
